ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities on the osu-wiki repository include multiple pull requests focused on updating event listings, such as MWC 7K 2025 team listings and additions of new tournament pages like ANZT6W. These updates contribute to maintaining a comprehensive and accurate record of osu! community events and tournaments.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu repository has seen significant activity with multiple pull requests addressing various aspects of the game. Notably, these include the addition of basic difficulty and performance calculations for the Autopilot mod, rebalancing of osu!taiko's star rating and performance points, and adjustments to stamina calculation to enhance game balance and player experience.

ppy/osu-web.summary: Activity on the osu-web repository involves replacing ts-loader and terser with swc, indicating efforts to optimize and modernize the development workflow for the web component of osu!, potentially leading to improved performance and efficiency.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: The SDL3-CS repository has updates focusing on bindings, particularly the inclusion of pen support for iOS and Android, reflecting ongoing efforts to ensure cross-platform compatibility and enhance user interaction with osu! across different devices.
